data.title: Tesla stock touches record high after Wedbush analyst increases price target
data.text: Yahoo Finance’s Emily McCormick joins Akiko Fujita to break down Tesla hitting a new record high after Wedbush analyst Dan Ives boosted his price target on the electric car maker to $1,900 per share.

data.title: Nasdaq Hits New Record on NVIDIA, Tesla Upgrades
data.text: The S&P 500 came close to an all-time high as well.

data.title: Tesla shares rally for no reason
data.text: Tesla shares surpassed $1,800 for the first time today, the latest in an eye-popping run up of the stock that has propelled the company’s valuation to more than $341 billion. Let’s put these numbers in perspective.

data.title: Nasdaq Jumps To High: Tesla Soars; Ollie’s, JD.com Clear Buy Points

data.title: Tesla's stock tops $1,800, after soaring more than 30% in 4 days
data.text: Shares of Tesla Inc. TSLA, +9.79% shot up 9.8% in afternoon trading, to propel them above the $1,800 mark for the first time, after an upbeat call from Wedbush analyst Dan Ives.

data.title: Tesla's Full Self-Driving Software To Make 'Quantum Leap,' Musk Says
data.text: A car that can fully drive itself is the goal of many companies, but the most advanced product that can be buy today comes from Tesla Inc.

data.title: Tesla, Apple Among 10 Hottest Stocks That Hedge Funds Bought In Q2
data.text: Hedge funds were hot on Tesla stock, but its largest shareholder, Baillie Gifford, cut its stake. Workday stock was most popular in Q2.

data.title: Morgan Stanley's Adam Jonas: Tesla has potential to be a large battery supplier
data.text: Adam Jonas of Morgan Stanley joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss Tesla's strength in the battery space and the new price target for the stock.

data.title: SoftBank builds $1.2 billion Amazon stake; invests in Netflix, Tesla
data.text: SoftBank Group Corp has built a stake worth around $1.2 billion in e-commerce firm Amazon , regulatory filings showed on Monday, as the tech conglomerate expands its investing activities beyond its recent focus on unlisted startups.

data.title: Wedbush Raises Tesla Price Target To $1,900, Calls China A 'Paradigm Changer'
data.text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) traded higher by another 8.5% on Monday after one Wall Street analyst raised his price target for the electric vehicle stock.

data.title: Tesla Could Be Worth More Than Walmart
data.text: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) has a market cap of $308 billion.

data.title: Tesla's stock rallies into record territory after Wedbush raises price target
data.text: Tesla Inc.'s stock TSLA, +1.83% climbed 1.8% in premarket trading Monday, putting them on track to open in record territory, after analyst Dan Ives at Wedbush raised his price target to $1,900 from $1,800, citing continued signs of accelerating demand in China.

data.title: Tesla's China-Made Electric Vehicle Registrations Plunged 24% In July
data.text: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) saw a 24% month-on-month slump in new registrations of its Shanghai-made electric vehicles in China in July, according to a state-backed industry body.
